New Records: Sri Lanka achieved their largest win by runs against the West Indies.
Key Match Events: Dunith Wellalage took three wickets for nine runs in his debut match.
Pathum Nissanka scored 54 runs off 49 deliveries.
Romario Shepherd took 2-23 for the West Indies.
West Indies were bowled out for 89 in the 17th over.
Spinners Maheesh Theekshana, Charith Asalanka, and Wanindu Hasaranga took two wickets each.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The third and series-deciding match will be played at the same venue on Thursday.
